stress

Vector3

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:20

The scaling to apply to the geometry in the initial configuration. This has a slightly strange sounding name because it involves a reference frame specific transformation. This may be replaced by a Matrix3 in future.

Default: vector(1, 1, 1)

tilt

Spinor3

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:34

The rotor to apply to the geometry (after scale has been applied).

Default: 1
